meaningMnemonic: A <radical>spirit</radical> wearing two <radical>mustache</radical>s must be <kanji>evil</kanji>. Everyone knows a mustache makes you evil, but two? And on a spirit? Yup, definitely evil.
readingMnemonic: You're watching the <kanji>evil</kanji> mustache spirit when it starts to float toward your <reading>ca</reading>r (か). And it's... hey! It's trashing your car! You knew this guy was evil!
